org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power

Class MyPowerDatacenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
      • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.Datacenter
        • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.MyDatacenter
          • org.cloudbus.cloudsim.power.MyPowerDatacenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable

    public class MyPowerDatacenter
extends MyDatacenter
    My Power-aware Datacenter is a Datacenter which overwrites all methods to be in accordance with power-aware ability.
    Author:
    Baptiste Louis
